00034 // Using  double precision SIMD oriented Fast Mersenne Twister(dSFMT)
00035 // by M Saito, T. Nishimura and M. Matsumoto.
00036 // See FRED/src/PRNG__Mersenne_Twister/dSFMT-src-2.2/LICENSE.txt for acknowledgements.
00037 
00038 #define INIT_RANDOM(SEED)   RNG::init(SEED)
00039 #define RANDOM()        RNG::random_double()
00040 
00041 #define IRAND(LOW,HIGH) ( (int) ( (LOW) + (int) ( ( (HIGH)-(LOW)+1 ) * RNG::random_double() ) ) )
00042 #define URAND(LOW,HIGH) ((double)((LOW)+(((HIGH)-(LOW))*RANDOM())))
00043 
00044 #define IRAND_0_7() ( RNG::random_int_0_7() )
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048 
00049 // BufferLengthChar must be multiple of 4
00050 
00051 template< int BufferLengthDouble, int BufferLengthChar, int BufferLengthInt, int MaxBufferedInt >
00052 struct RNG_State {
00053 
00054   double buffer_dbl[ BufferLengthDouble ];
00055   int buffer_index_dbl;
00056   dsfmt_t dsfmt_state_dbl;
00057 
00058   union union_int {
00059     struct union_char {
00060       unsigned char c0, c1, c2, c3;
00061     } uc;
00062     unsigned int i;
00063   };
00064 
00065   char buffer_char[ BufferLengthChar ];
00066   int buffer_index_char;
00067   dsfmt_t dsfmt_state_char;
00068 
00069   RNG_State() {
00070     buffer_index_dbl = BufferLengthDouble;
00071     buffer_index_char = BufferLengthChar;
00072     dsfmt_state_dbl = dsfmt_t();
00073     dsfmt_state_char = dsfmt_t();
00074   }
00075    
00076   void init( int seed ) {
00077     dsfmt_init_gen_rand( &dsfmt_state_char, seed );
00078     dsfmt_init_gen_rand( &dsfmt_state_dbl, seed );
00079   }
00080 
00081   double random_double() {
00082     if ( buffer_index_dbl == BufferLengthDouble ) {
00083       refresh_doubles_buffer(); 
00084     }
00085     return buffer_dbl[ buffer_index_dbl++ ];
00086   }
00087 
00088   unsigned char random_char() {
00089     if ( buffer_index_char == BufferLengthChar ) {
00090       refresh_chars_buffer(); 
00091     }
00092     return buffer_char[ buffer_index_char++ ];
00093   }
00094 
00095   void refresh_doubles_buffer() {
00096     dsfmt_fill_array_open_open( &dsfmt_state_dbl,
00097         buffer_dbl, BufferLengthDouble );
00098     buffer_index_dbl = 0;
00099   }
00100 
00101   void refresh_chars_buffer() {
00102     int buffer_start = BufferLengthChar - buffer_index_char;
00103     for ( int i = buffer_start; i < BufferLengthChar; i += 4 ) {
00104       union_int u;
00105       u.i = dsfmt_genrand_uint32( &dsfmt_state_char );
00106       buffer_char[ i + 0 ] = u.uc.c0;
00107       buffer_char[ i + 1 ] = u.uc.c1;
00108       buffer_char[ i + 2 ] = u.uc.c1;
00109       buffer_char[ i + 3 ] = u.uc.c1;
00110     }
00111     buffer_index_char = 0;
00112   }
00113 
00114   void refresh_all_buffers() {
00115     refresh_doubles_buffer();
00116     refresh_chars_buffer();
00117   }
00118 
00119 };
00120 
00121 
00122 
00123 struct RNG {
00124   static void init( int seed );
00125   static double random_double();
00126   static unsigned char random_char();
00127   static int random_int_0_7();
00128   static void refresh_all_buffers();
00129 };

00143 void sample_range_without_replacement( int n, int s, int * result );

00145 template <typename T> 
00146 void FYShuffle( std::vector <T> &array){
00147   int m,randIndx;
00148   T tmp;
00149   unsigned int n = array.size();
00150   m=n;
00151   while (m > 0){
00152     randIndx = (int)(RANDOM()*n);
00153     m--;
00154     tmp = array[m];
00155     array[m] = array[randIndx];
00156     array[randIndx] = tmp;
00157   }
00158 }
